00084 DecomposeNNP::DecomposeNNP()
00085 {
00086         MAX_dcp            = sizeof( dcp ) / sizeof( struct decomposingPattern );
00087         numberofxpList     = sizeof( xpList ) / sizeof( char* );
00088         numberofxsnList    = sizeof( xsnList ) / sizeof( char* );
00089         numberofxsnxsnList = sizeof( xsnxsnList ) / sizeof( char* );
00090         numberofconjList   = sizeof( conjList ) / sizeof( char* );
00091 
00092         initializeCnoun();
00093 }

00102 
00103         memset( weightlist, -1, sizeof(int)*MAX_CANDIDATE );
00104         memset( tupleN_, 0, sizeof(NounsTuple)*MAX_CANDIDATE );

00108 int DecomposeNNP::searchList( char** list, unsigned int numoflist, const StringEx & word )
00109 {
00110         int lower = 0, upper = numoflist-1, mid, ret;
00111         
00112         while( lower <= upper ) 
00113         {
00114                 mid = (lower + upper) / 2;
00115 
00116                 ret = strcmp( word.c_str(), list[mid] );
00117 
00118                 if( ret == 0 )          return 1;
00119                 else if( ret > 0 )      lower = mid + 1;
00120                 else                            upper = mid - 1;
00121         }
00122 
00123         return -1;
00124 }

00126 int DecomposeNNP::isXP( const StringEx & word )
00127 {
00128         return searchList( xpList, numberofxpList, word );

00131 int DecomposeNNP::isXSN( const StringEx & word )

00135 
00136 int DecomposeNNP::isXSNXSN( const StringEx & word )

00138         return searchList( xsnxsnList, numberofxsnxsnList, word );
00139 }
00140 
00141 int DecomposeNNP::isCONJ( const StringEx & word )
00142 {
00143         return searchList( conjList, numberofconjList, word );
00144 }

00146 unsigned int DecomposeNNP::getSyllableLength( const StringEx & word )
00147 {
00148         unsigned int wordLength = (unsigned int)word.getLength();
00149         unsigned int cnt = 0;
00150 
00151         for( unsigned int i=0; i < wordLength; i++ )
00152         {
00153                 if( (word[i] >= '!') && (word[i] <= '~') )      cnt++;  // 33~126
00154         }
00155 
00156         if( cnt != 0 )
00157         {
00158                 if( cnt > 1 )   --cnt;
00159                 return                  (wordLength/2)+(cnt);
00160         }
00161         else    return wordLength/2;
00162 }

00164 int DecomposeNNP::isDigit( const char ch )
00165 {
00166         if( !(ch >= '0' && ch <= '9') ) return 0;
00167 
00168         return 1;
00169 }

00171 double DecomposeNNP::getWeight( int index )
00172 {
00173         if( weightlist[index] < 0 ) return 0.0;
00174         else                                            return tupleN_[ weightlist[index] ].weightScore;

00181         if( nnp.isEmpty() )

00183                 DcInfo[0] = '$';

00195 
00196         if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( nnp, si, nnpLen ) == 0 ) tag = 0;
00197         else tag = si.mti.tag;
00198 
00199         if( (nnpLen == 4) && !(tag & N_) )
00200         {
00201                 char chHi = *( nnp.getBuffer()+2 );
00202                 *( nnp.getBuffer()+2 ) = 0;
00203 
00204                 if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( nnp, si, 2 ) == 0 ) tag = 0;

00206 
00207                 *( nnp.getBuffer()+2 ) = chHi;
00208         
00209                 if( isXSN( nnp.getBuffer()+2 ) == 1 )
00210                 {
00211                         if( (tag & Np) && (nnp.endWith("들")) )
00212                         {
00213                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00214                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'P';
00215                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00216                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'Y';
00217                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00218                         }
00219                         else if( tag & NNg )
00220                         {
00221                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 2;
00222                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00223                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'Y';
00224                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00225                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = '@';
00226                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'U';
00227                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 2;
00228                         }
00229                         else if( (tag & NNb) && ( (nnp.endWith("들")) ||
00230                                 ((si.pinfoNNB[0] & NBI_UNIT) && (nnp.endWith("씩"))) ) )
00231                         {
00232                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00233                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'B';
00234                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00235                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'Y';

00242                         else tag = si.mti.tag;
00243 
00244                         if( (si.mti.tag & NNb) && ( (si.pinfoNNB[0] & NBI_INDEPENDENT) || (si.pinfoNNB[0] & NBI_DEPENDENT) ) )
00245                         {
00246                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00247                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00248                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'B';
00249                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00250                         }
00251                 }

00254                         if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( nnp.getBuffer()+2, si, 2 ) == 0 )        tag = 0;
00255                         else                                                                                                                                            tag = si.mti.tag;
00256 
00257                         if( (si.mti.tag & NNb) && ( (si.pinfoNNB[0] & NBI_INDEPENDENT) || (si.pinfoNNB[0] & NBI_DEPENDENT) ) )
00258                         {
00259                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00260                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'B';
00261                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00262                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'B';
00263                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00264                         }
00265                 }
00266                 else if( (si.mti.tag & NNb) )
00267                 {
00268                         if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( nnp.getBuffer()+2, si, 2 ) == 0 )        tag = 0;
00269                         else                                                                                                                                            tag = si.mti.tag;
00270 
00271                         if( si.mti.tag & NNg )
00272                         {
00273                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00274                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'B';
00275                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00276                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00277                         }
00278                 }
00279         }
00280         else if( tag & NNp )
00281         {
00282                 _divpt = si.pinfoNNP;
00283 
00284                 if( _divpt.getIndex(0, '@') == -1 )     DcInfo[cnt] = 1;
00285                 else                                                            DcInfo[cnt] = _divpt.getNumberOfChar('@')+1;
00286                 cnt++;
00287 
00288                 for( unsigned int i=0; i < _divpt.length(); i++)
00289                 {
00290                         if( isDigit( _divpt[i] ) == 1 ) DcInfo[cnt++] = _divpt[i] - '0';
00291                         else
00292                         {
00293                                 if( _divpt[i] == '@' )
00294                                 {
00295                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = _divpt[i];
00296                                         continue;
00297                                 }
00298 
00299                                 int tempCnt=1;
00300                                 for( ; _divpt[i] == _divpt[i+1]; i++)   tempCnt++;
00301 
00302                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = _divpt[i];
00303                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = tempCnt;
00304                         }
00305                 }
00306         }
00307         else if( tag & NNu )
00308         {
00309                 _divpt = si.pinfoNNU;
00310 
00311                 if( _divpt == "0" )
00312                 {
00313                         DcInfo[cnt] = '$';
00314                         return DcInfo;
00315                 }
00316 
00317                 if( _divpt.getIndex(0, '@') == -1 )     DcInfo[cnt] = 1;
00318                 else                                                            DcInfo[cnt] = _divpt.getNumberOfChar('@')+1;
00319                 cnt++;
00320 
00321                 for( unsigned int i=0; i < _divpt.length(); i++ )
00322                 {
00323                         if( isDigit( _divpt[i] ) == 1 )
00324                         {
00325                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'N';
00326                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = _divpt[i] - '0';
00327                         }
00328                         else
00329                         {
00330                                 if( _divpt[i] == '@' )
00331                                 {
00332                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = _divpt[i];
00333                                         continue;
00334                                 }
00335 
00336                                 int tempCnt=1;
00337                                 for( ; _divpt[i] == _divpt[i+1]; i++)   tempCnt++;
00338                                                                 
00339                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = _divpt[i];
00340                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = tempCnt;
00341                         }
00342                 }       
00343         }
00344         else
00345         {
00346                 _nnplen   = (int)nnp.length();
00347                 _nnp      = nnp;
00348 
00349                 searchAllRegisteredN_( );
00350 
00351                 int maxCN=0, minCN=0;
00352                 if( (DcInfo[cnt] = (char)decomposing( nnp )) < 1 )
00353                 {
00354                         DcInfo[cnt] = '$';
00355                         return DcInfo;
00356                 }
00357                 cnt++;
00358 
00359                 for( int i=0; (tupleN_[i].cnoun[0].pattern != 0) && (i < MAX_CANDIDATE); i++ )
00360                 {
00361                         if( tupleN_[i].cnoun[0].pattern == -1 )                                         continue;
00362                         if( tupleN_[maxCN].weightScore < tupleN_[i].weightScore )       maxCN = i;
00363                         if( tupleN_[minCN].weightScore > tupleN_[i].weightScore )       minCN = i;
00364                         if( mode == 1 )                                                                                         continue;
00365                         if( tupleN_[i].weightScore < CRITICAL_VALUE )                           continue;
00366 
00367                         for( int j=0; (tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern > 0) && (j < MAX_NOUN); j++ )
00368                         {
00369                                 switch( tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].info )
00370                                 {
00371                                 case 'X': case 'Y': case 'B': case 'U': case 'C':
00372                                 case 'I': case 'P': case 'N': case 'F': case 'J':
00373                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].info;
00374                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = (char)tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern;
00375                                         break;
00376                                 default:
00377                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = (char)tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern;
00378                                         break;
00379                                 }
00380                         }
00381 
00382                         DcInfo[cnt] = '@';
00383                         cnt++;
00384 
00385                         weightlist[wlcnt++] = i;
00386                 }
00387 
00388                 if( (cnt == 1) || (mode == 1) )
00389                 {
00390                         if( tupleN_[maxCN].weightScore < 0.0 )
00391                         {
00392                                 DcInfo[0] = '%';
00393                                 return DcInfo;
00394                         }
00395                         else if( tupleN_[maxCN].weightScore < 0.4 )
00396                         {
00397                                 DcInfo[0] = -1;
00398                                 postProcessDcInfo( cnt, tag, (int)nnp.length() );
00399                     DcInfo[cnt] = '$';
00400                                 return DcInfo;
00401                         }
00402 
00403                         int i = maxCN;
00404                         for( int j=0; (tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern > 0) && (j < MAX_NOUN); j++ )
00405                         {
00406                                 switch( tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].info )
00407                                 {
00408                                 case 'X': case 'Y': case 'B': case 'U': case 'C':
00409                                 case 'I': case 'P': case 'N': case 'F': case 'J':
00410                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].info;
00411                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = (char)tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern;
00412                                         break;
00413                                 default:
00414                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = (char)tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern;
00415                                         break;
00416                                 }
00417                         }
00418 
00419                         weightlist[wlcnt++] = maxCN;
00420                 }
00421         }
00422 
00423         if( (cnt > 1) && (DcInfo[cnt-1] == '@') )       cnt--;
00424         postProcessDcInfo( cnt, tag, nnpLen );
00425         DcInfo[cnt] = '$';
00426         return DcInfo;
00427 }
00428 
00429 int DecomposeNNP::postProcessDcInfo( int cnt, int tag, int len )
00430 {
00431         strDcInfo = DcInfo;
00432         
00433         char temp[3];
00434         int cntU1;
00435         int cntAT = strDcInfo.getNumberOfChar( '@' );
00436         unsigned int sp = 1;
00437         unsigned int posAT;
00438         unsigned int posU1;
00439 
00440         if( cntAT > 0 )
00441         {
00442                 for( int i=0; i < cntAT; i++ )
00443                 {
00444                         posAT = strDcInfo.getIndex( sp, '@' );
00445                         tmpDcInfo = strDcInfo.getSubString( sp, posAT );
00446                         cntU1 = tmpDcInfo.getNumberOfStr( "U1" );
00447 
00448                         for( int j=0; j < cntU1; j++ )
00449                         {
00450                                 posU1 = tmpDcInfo.getIndex( sp, "U1" );
00451 
00452                                 if( posU1 > 0 )
00453                                 {
00454                                         temp[0] = 'U';
00455                                         temp[1] = '1' + tmpDcInfo[posU1-1];
00456                                         temp[2] = '\0';
00457 
00458                                         tmpDcInfo.replaceString( tmpDcInfo.getSubString(posU1-1, posU1+2).buffer(), temp );
00459                                 }
00460 
00461                                 sp = posU1+2;
00462                                 if( sp >= tmpDcInfo.length() )  break;
00463                         }
00464 
00465                         tmpDcInfo += "@";
00466                         if( strDcInfo.getIndex( tmpDcInfo ) < 0 )       addDcInfo += tmpDcInfo;
00467                         sp = posAT+1;
00468                         if( sp >= strDcInfo.length() )  break;
00469                 }
00470         }
00471         
00472         if( !(tag & NNp) && (len == 6) && (_mode == 2) )
00473         {
00474                 for( unsigned int i=1; i < strDcInfo.length()-1; i++ )
00475                 {
00476                         if( strDcInfo[i] == 1 || strDcInfo[i] == 2 )
00477                                 strDcInfo[i] = (char)strDcInfo[i] + '0';
00478                 }
00479 
00480                 if( (strDcInfo.getSubString( sp, strDcInfo.length()-1 ) == "21") ||
00481                         (strDcInfo.getSubString( sp, strDcInfo.length()-1 ) == "2Y1") )
00482                 {
00483                         SearchInfo nngsi;
00484                         int nngtag;
00485                         if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( _nnp.getBuffer()+2, nngsi, 4 ) == 0 ) nngtag = 0;
00486                         else nngtag = nngsi.mti.tag;
00487 
00488                         char chHi = *( _nnp.getBuffer()+2 );
00489                         *( _nnp.getBuffer()+2 ) = 0;
00490                         
00491                         if( (nngtag & NNg) && (isXP( _nnp ) == 1) )
00492                         {
00493                                 DcInfo[0]++;
00494                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = '@';
00495                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'X';
00496                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00497                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 2;
00498 
00499                                 if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( _nnp.getBuffer(), nngsi, 2 ) == 0 ) nngtag = 0;
00500                                 else nngtag = nngsi.mti.tag;
00501 
00502                                 if( nngtag & NNg )
00503                                 {
00504                                         DcInfo[0]++;
00505                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = '@';
00506                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00507                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = 2;
00508                                 }
00509                         }
00510 
00511                         *( _nnp.getBuffer()+2 ) = chHi;
00512                 }
00513                 else if( _specialPattern.getIndex( ":"+strDcInfo.getSubString( sp, strDcInfo.length()-1 )+":" ) >= 0 )
00514                 {
00515                         DcInfo[0]++;
00516                         DcInfo[cnt++] = '@';
00517                         DcInfo[cnt++] = 'U';
00518                         DcInfo[cnt++] = 3;
00519                 }
00520         }
00521 
00522         if( (!(tag & NNp) && (len == 8) && (strDcInfo.getIndex('U') > -1)) 
00523                 || ((len == 8) && (DcInfo[0] == -1)) )
00524         {
00525                 for( unsigned int i=1; i < strDcInfo.length()-1; i++ )
00526                 {
00527                         if( (strDcInfo[i] == 2) || (strDcInfo[i] == 4) )
00528                                 strDcInfo[i] = (char)strDcInfo[i] + '0';
00529                 }
00530 
00531                 int pos = 0;
00532                 if( (pos=_specialPattern.getIndex( ":"+strDcInfo.getSubString( sp, strDcInfo.length()-1 )+":" )) >= 0 )
00533                 {
00534                         SearchInfo nngsi;
00535                         int nngtag;
00536                         if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( _nnp.getBuffer()+2, nngsi, 6 ) == 0 ) nngtag = 0;
00537                         else nngtag = nngsi.mti.tag;
00538 
00539                         if( nngtag & NNg )
00540                         {
00541                                 if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( _nnp.getSubString(0,2), nngsi, 2 ) == 0 ) nngtag = 0;
00542                                 else nngtag = nngsi.mti.tag;
00543 
00544                                 if( nngtag & NNg )
00545                                 {
00546                                         DcInfo[0]++;
00547                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = '@';
00548                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00549                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = 3;
00550                                 }
00551                                 else
00552                                 {
00553                                         DcInfo[0]++;
00554                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = '@';
00555                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = 'U';
00556                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = 1;
00557                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = 3;
00558                                 }
00559                         }
00560                         else if( (isXP( _nnp.getSubString(0,2) ) == 1) && (isXSN( _nnp.getBuffer()+6 ) == 1) )
00561                         {
00562                                 if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( _nnp.getSubString(2,6), nngsi, 4 ) == 0 ) nngtag = 0;
00563                                 else nngtag = nngsi.mti.tag;
00564 
00565                                 if( nngtag & NNg )
00566                                 {
00567                                         DcInfo[0] = 1;
00568                                         DcInfo[1] = 'X';
00569                                         DcInfo[2] = 1;
00570                                         DcInfo[3] = 2;
00571                                         DcInfo[4] = 'Y';
00572                                         DcInfo[5] = 1;
00573                                 }
00574                         }
00575                         else if( pos == 34 )
00576                         {
00577                                 if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( _nnp.getBuffer()+4, nngsi, 4 ) == 0 ) nngtag = 0;
00578                                 else nngtag = nngsi.mti.tag;
00579 
00580                                 if( nngtag & NNg )
00581                                 {
00582                                         DcInfo[0]++;
00583                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = '@';
00584                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = 'U';
00585                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = 2;
00586                                         DcInfo[cnt++] = 2;
00587                                 }
00588                         }
00589                 }
00590                 else if( DcInfo[0] == -1 )
00591                 {
00592                         SearchInfo nngsi;
00593                         int nngtag;
00594                         if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( _nnp.getBuffer()+4, nngsi, 4 ) == 0 ) nngtag = 0;
00595                         else nngtag = nngsi.mti.tag;
00596 
00597                         if( nngtag & NNg )
00598                         {
00599                                 DcInfo[0] = 1;
00600                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 'U';
00601                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 2;
00602                                 DcInfo[cnt++] = 2;
00603                         }
00604                 }
00605         }
00606 
00607         return 0;
00608 }
00609 
00610 void DecomposeNNP::checkPattern( int numofcandidates )
00611 {
00612         for( int i=0; i < numofcandidates-1; i++ )
00613         {
00614                 for( int j=i+1; j < numofcandidates; j++ )
00615                 {
00616                         int flag = 0;
00617                 
00618                         for( int k=0; k < MAX_NOUN; k++ )
00619                         {
00620                                 if( tupleN_[j].cnoun[0].pattern == -1 )
00621                                 {
00622                                         flag = 1;
00623                                         break;
00624                                 }
00625                                 if( tupleN_[i].cnoun[k].pattern != (tupleN_[j].cnoun[k].pattern) )      flag = 1;
00626                                 if( tupleN_[i].cnoun[k].info != (tupleN_[j].cnoun[k].info) )            flag = 1;
00627                         }
00628                         
00629                         if( flag == 0 )
00630                         {
00631                                 if( sumofweight[i] >= sumofweight[j] )  tupleN_[j].cnoun[0].pattern = -1;
00632                                 else                                                                    tupleN_[i].cnoun[0].pattern = -1;
00633                         }
00634                 }
00635         }
00636 }
00637 
00638 int DecomposeNNP::getQueryCandidates( const StringEx & nnp )
00639 {
00640         _nnp = nnp;
00641         _total = 0;
00642         initializeCnoun();
00643 
00644         SearchInfo si;
00645         int tag;
00646         if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( nnp, si, (int)nnp.length() ) == 0 ) tag = 0;
00647         else tag = si.mti.tag;
00648 
00649         if( tag & NNp )
00650         {
00651                 _divpt = si.pinfoNNP;
00652 
00653                 int sp=0, ep=0;
00654 
00655                 while( (ep=_divpt.getIndex(sp, '@')) > -1 )
00656                 {
00657                         generateSimpleWord( _divpt.getSubString(sp, ep).getBuffer() );
00658                         printDivPattern( _divpt.getSubString(sp, ep).getBuffer() );
00659                         sp = ep+1;
00660                         _total++;
00661                 }
00662 
00663                 ep = (int)_divpt.getLength();
00664                 generateSimpleWord( _divpt.getSubString(sp, ep).getBuffer() );
00665                 printDivPattern( _divpt.getSubString(sp, ep).getBuffer() );
00666         }
00667         else    decomposing( nnp );
00668 
00669         printQueries();
00670         return cntquery;
00671 }
00672 
00673 void DecomposeNNP::generateSimpleWord( char* divpattern )
00674 {
00675         int i=0, sp=0, ep=0;
00676 
00677         while( divpattern[i] != '\0' )
00678         {
00679                 if( (divpattern[i] >= '1') && (divpattern[i] <= '9') )
00680                 {
00681                         tupleN_[_total].cnoun[i].pattern = divpattern[i] - '0';
00682                         ep += (divpattern[i] - '0') * 2;                        // char를 int로 변환
00683                         addQuery( _nnp.getSubString(sp, ep) );
00684 
00685                         if( (i > 0) && (divpattern[i-1] == 'X') )
00686                         {
00687                                 addQuery( _nnp.getSubString(sp-2, ep) );
00688 
00689                                 if( (i > 1) && (divpattern[i-2] == 'X') )       addQuery( _nnp.getSubString(sp-4, ep) );
00690                         }
00691                         if( (i < (MAX_NOUN-1)) && (divpattern[i+1] == 'Y') )
00692                         {
00693                                 addQuery( _nnp.getSubString(sp, ep+2) );
00694 
00695                                 if( (i < (MAX_NOUN-2)) && (divpattern[i+2] == 'Y') )    addQuery( _nnp.getSubString(sp, ep+4) );
00696                         }
00697                 }
00698                 else if( (divpattern[i] == 'X') || (divpattern[i] == 'Y') )
00699                 {
00700                         tupleN_[_total].cnoun[i].pattern = 1;
00701                         tupleN_[_total].cnoun[i].info = divpattern[i];
00702                         ep += 1*2;
00703                 }
00704                 else
00705                 {
00706                         cerr << "divpattern error.." << endl;
00707                         return ;
00708                 }
00709 
00710                 sp = ep;
00711                 i++;
00712         }
00713 }
00714 
00715 void DecomposeNNP::printDivPattern( char* divpattern )
00716 {
00717         int i=0, sp=0, ep=0;
00718 
00719         if( divpattern[0] == '\0' )     return ;
00720         else if( divpattern[0] == '0' )
00721         {
00722                 cout << "분해 결과 : " << _nnp;
00723                 return ;
00724         }
00725         else if( divpattern[i] == 'X' )
00726         {
00727                 ep += 1*2;
00728                 cout << "분해 결과 : " << _nnp.getSubString(sp, ep);
00729         }
00730         else
00731         {
00732                 ep += (divpattern[i] - '0') * 2;
00733                 cout << "분해 결과 : " << _nnp.getSubString(sp, ep);
00734         }
00735 
00736         sp = ep;
00737         i++;
00738 
00739         while( divpattern[i] != '\0' )
00740         {
00741                 if( (divpattern[i] >= '1') && (divpattern[i] <= '9') )          ep += (divpattern[i] - '0') * 2;
00742                 else if( (divpattern[i] == 'X') || (divpattern[i] == 'Y') )     ep += 1 * 2;
00743                 else
00744                 {
00745                         cerr << "divpattern error.." << endl;
00746                         return ;
00747                 }
00748 
00749                 cout << " + " << _nnp.getSubString(sp, ep);
00750                 sp = ep;
00751                 i++;
00752         }
00753 
00754         cout << endl;
00755 }
00756 
00757 
00758 void DecomposeNNP::printQueries()
00759 {
00760         cout << "\n추출된 색인어 : " << cntquery << " 개" << endl;
00761 
00762         for( int i=0; i < cntquery; i++ )       cout << querycandidates[i] << endl;
00763 }
00764 
00765 void DecomposeNNP::addQuery( const StringEx & query )
00766 {
00767         for( int i=0; i < cntquery; i++ )
00768                 if( querycandidates[i] == query )       return;
00769 
00770         querycandidates[cntquery] = query;
00771         cntquery++;
00772 }
00773 
00774 int DecomposeNNP::decomposing( const StringEx & nnp )
00775 {
00776         int numofcandidates = 0, i, exclusion = 0;
00777 
00778         unsigned int syllableLength = getSyllableLength( nnp );
00779         _flag     = 0;
00780         _addedcnt = 0;
00781         _total    = 1;
00782         _nnpflag  = 0;
00783         
00784         numofcandidates = generateCandidates( 0, 0, 0 );
00785 
00786         SearchInfo si;
00787         int     tag;
00788 
00789         for( i=0; i < numofcandidates; i++ )
00790         {
00791                 unsigned int sum = 0;
00792                 sumofweight[i] = 0;
00793 
00794                 int flag = 0;
00795 
00796                 for( int j=0; (tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern > 0) && (j < MAX_NOUN); j++ )
00797                 {
00798                         if( tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].info == 'U' )
00799                         {
00800                                 if( _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( nnp.getSubString(sum*2, (sum+tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern)*2),
00801                                         si, (tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern)*2 ) == 0 )    tag = 0;
00802                                 else                                                                                            tag = si.mti.tag;
00803 
00804                                 if( flag == 1 )
00805                                 {
00806                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].weight = -3;
00807                                 }
00808                                 if( (j > 0) && (tag & NNb) && (si.pinfoNNB[0] == NBI_INDEPENDENT))
00809                                 {
00810                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].info   = 'B';
00811                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].weight = 1;
00812                                 }
00813                                 else if( (j == 0) && (tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern >= 2) && (tag & Np) )
00814                                 {
00815                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].info   = 'P';
00816                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].weight = 1;
00817                                 }
00818                                 else if( (j == 0) && (tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern == 1) && (isXP(_nnp.getSubString(0,2)) == 1) )
00819                                 {
00820                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].info   = 'X';
00821                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].weight = 1;
00822                                 }
00823                                 else if( tag & NNg )
00824                                 {
00825                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].info = ' ';
00826                                         
00827                                         if( j > 0 )             tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].weight++;
00828                                         if( (j > 0) && (_nnplen <= 6) ) tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].weight++;
00829                                 }
00830                                 else if( tag & NNi )
00831                                 {
00832                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].info   = 'I';
00833                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].weight = 10;
00834                                 }
00835                                 else if( (j > 0) && (tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern == 1) 
00836                                         && (tupleN_[i].cnoun[j+1].pattern > 0)
00837                                         && (isCONJ(_nnp.getSubString(sum*2,sum*2+2)) == 1) )
00838                                 {
00839                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].info   = 'C';
00840                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].weight = 3;
00841                                 }
00842                                 else if( (syllableLength > 3) && (tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern < 4) )
00843                                 {
00844                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].weight -= 2;
00845                                 }
00846                         }
00847                         else if( tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].info == 'X' )
00848                         {
00849                                 flag = 1;
00850                                 
00851                                 if( tupleN_[i].cnoun[j+1].info == 'Y' )
00852                                 {
00853                                         tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].weight = -3;
00854                                 }
00855                         }               
00856 
00857                         sum                        += tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].pattern;
00858                         sumofweight[i] += tupleN_[i].cnoun[j].weight;
00859                 }
00860 
00861                 if( sum != syllableLength )     tupleN_[i].cnoun[0].pattern = -1;
00862         }
00863         
00864         checkPattern( numofcandidates );
00865         
00866         for( i=0; i < numofcandidates; i++ )
00867         {
00868                 if( tupleN_[i].cnoun[0].pattern == -1 )
00869                 {
00870                         exclusion++;
00871                         continue;
00872                 }
00873 
00874                 tupleN_[i].weightScore = scoringPattern( tupleN_[i].cnoun ) + (sumofweight[i]/10.0);
00875         }
00876 
00877         return numofcandidates-exclusion;
00878 }
00879 
00880 int DecomposeNNP::searchAllRegisteredN_( )//const StringEx & eojul )
00881 {
00882 //      char* ptr = eojul.buffer();
00883         _allN_List.clear();
00884 
00885 //      int len = (int)strlen( ptr );
00886 
00887         int i;
00888         for( i = 0; i < _nnplen; i+=2 )
00889         {
00890                 _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromMainTrie( _nnp.buffer(), _allN_List, _nnplen, i, true, false, false );
00891         }
00892 /*
00893         for( i = 0; i < (int)_allN_List.size(); i++ )
00894         {
00895                 char ch = ptr[ _allN_List[i].pos ];
00896                 ptr[ _allN_List[i].pos ] = 0;
00897 
00898                 cerr << ptr + _allN_List[i].posStart << endl;
00899 
00900                 ptr[ _allN_List[i].pos ] = ch;
00901         }
00902 */      
00903         return 1;
00904 }
00905 
00906 int DecomposeNNP::addTuple( int num, int cnt, int pattern, char info )
00907 {
00908         tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].pattern = pattern/2;
00909         tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].info    = info;
00910 
00911         switch( info )
00912         {
00913         case 'X': case 'Y':
00914                 tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight = 1;
00915                 break;
00916         case 'I':
00917                 tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight = 3;
00918                 if( pattern == 6 )      tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight += 5;
00919                 break;
00920         case 'P': case 'J':
00921                 tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight = 2;
00922                 break;
00923         case 'U':
00924                 tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight = -1;
00925                 break;
00926         case 'Q':
00927                 tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight = -3;
00928                 break;
00929         case 'N': 
00930                 tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight = pattern;
00931                 break;
00932         default:
00933                 tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight = pattern-1;
00934                 break;
00935         }
00936 
00937         return 1;
00938 }
00939 
00940 int DecomposeNNP::addNNP( int num, int cnt, int index, char info )
00941 {
00942         for( unsigned int i=0; i < _divpt.length(); i++ )
00943         {
00944                 if( _divpt[i] == 0 )    break;
00945 
00946                 if( isDigit( _divpt[i] ) == 1 )
00947                 {
00948                         int ptn = _divpt[i] - '0';
00949                         if( info == 'N' )
00950                         {
00951                                 addTuple( num, cnt, ptn*2, info );
00952                         }
00953                         else
00954                         {
00955                                 addTuple( num, cnt, ptn*2, ' ' );
00956                         }
00957                         tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight += 2;
00958                         tupleN_[num].index[cnt] = index;
00959                         cnt++;
00960                 }
00961                 else
00962                 {
00963                         int tempCnt=1;
00964                         for( ; _divpt[i] == _divpt[i+1]; i++ )  tempCnt++;
00965                         addTuple( num, cnt, tempCnt*2, _divpt[i]);
00966                         tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight+=2;
00967                         tupleN_[num].index[cnt] = index;
00968                         cnt++;
00969                 }
00970         }
00971 
00972         _nnpflag = 1;
00973 
00974         return cnt-1;
00975 }
00976 
00977 unsigned int DecomposeNNP::generateCandidates( int num, int index, int cnt )
00978 {
00979         if( _total >= MAX_CANDIDATE )                   return _total;
00980         if( (cnt >= MAX_NOUN) || (cnt < 0) )    return _total;
00981 
00982         if( _allN_List.size() == 0 )
00983         {
00984                 if( isXSN( _nnp.getBuffer() + (_nnplen - 2) ) == 1 )
00985                 {
00986                         addTuple( num, cnt, _nnplen-2, 'U' );
00987                         tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight++;
00988                         tupleN_[num].index[cnt++] = 'S';
00989                         addTuple( num, cnt++, 2, 'Y' );
00990                         tupleN_[num].cntElements = cnt;
00991                 }
00992                 else
00993                 {
00994                         addTuple( num, cnt, _nnplen, 'U' );
00995                         tupleN_[num].index[cnt++] = 'S';
00996                         tupleN_[num].cntElements = cnt;
00997                 }
00998                 return _total;
00999         }
01000 
01001         if( index > (int)_allN_List.size()-1 )
01002         {
01003                 if( (tupleN_[num].index[cnt-1] != 'S') && (_allN_List[ tupleN_[num].index[cnt-1] ].pos < _nnplen) )
01004                 {                       
01005                         int len = _nnplen-_allN_List[ tupleN_[num].index[cnt-1] ].pos;
01006 
01007                         if( (len == 2) && (isXSN( _nnp.getBuffer()+_allN_List[ tupleN_[num].index[cnt-1] ].pos) == 1) 
01008                                 && ( tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt-1].info != 'Y' ) && ( tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt-2].info != 'Y' ) )
01009                         {
01010                                 addTuple( num, cnt, len, 'Y' );
01011                                 tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight++;
01012                         }
01013                         else if( (len == 2) && (isXSN( _nnp.getBuffer()+_allN_List[ tupleN_[num].index[cnt-1] ].pos) == 1) 
01014                                 && ( tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt-1].info == 'Y' ) && ( tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt-2].info == ' ' ) )
01015                         {
01016                                 addTuple( num, cnt, len, 'Y' );
01017                                 tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight++;
01018                         }
01019                         else if( (len == 2) && (isXSN( _nnp.getBuffer()+_allN_List[ tupleN_[num].index[cnt-1] ].pos) == 1) 
01020                                 && ( tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt-1].info == ' ' ) && ( tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt-2].info == 'Y' ) )
01021                         {
01022                                 addTuple( num, cnt, len, 'Y' );
01023                                 tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight++;
01024                         }
01025                         else if( (len == 4) && (isXSNXSN( _nnp.getBuffer()+_allN_List[ tupleN_[num].index[cnt-1] ].pos) == 1)
01026                                 && ( tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt-1].info != 'Y' ) )
01027                         {
01028                                 addTuple( num, cnt, 2, 'Y' );
01029                                 tupleN_[num].index[cnt++] = 'S';
01030                                 addTuple( num, cnt, 2, 'Y' );
01031                                 tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight++;
01032                         }
01033                         else if( (len == 4) && (isXSN( _nnp.getBuffer()+_allN_List[ tupleN_[num].index[cnt-1] ].pos+2) == 1) )
01034                         {
01035                                 addTuple( num, cnt, 2, 'U' );
01036                                 tupleN_[num].index[cnt++] = 'S';
01037                                 addTuple( num, cnt, 2, 'Y' );
01038                                 tupleN_[num].cnoun[cnt].weight++;
01039                         }

01041                         {
01042                                 addTuple( num, cnt, 2, 'Y' );
01043                                 tupleN_[num].index[cnt++] = 'S';

01046                                 {

01050

01052                                         {

01054                                         }

01510                                 addTuple( num, cnt, _allN_List[index].pos-_allN_List[index].posStart, 'P' );
01511                         else    addTuple( num, cnt, _allN_List[index].pos-_allN_List[index].posStart, 'U' );
01512                         tupleN_[num].index[cnt] = index;
01513                         _nnpflag = 0;
01514                 }
01515                 else if( (_allN_List[index].mti.tag & NNu) && (strcmp( _allN_List[index].pinfoNNU, "0" ) == 0) )
01516                 {
01517                         char tagNNU = _allN_List[index].mti.isNNF ? 'F' : 'N';
01518                         addTuple( num, cnt, _allN_List[index].pos-_allN_List[index].posStart, tagNNU );
01519                         tupleN_[num].index[cnt] = index;
01520                         _nnpflag = 0;
01521                 }
01522                 else
01523                 {
01524                         char infoch;
01525 
01526                         if( _allN_List[index].mti.tag & NNu )
01527                         {
01528                                 _divpt = _allN_List[index].pinfoNNU;
01529                                 infoch = 'N';
01530                         }
01531                         else
01532                         {
01533                                 _divpt = _allN_List[index].pinfoNNP;
01534                                 infoch = 'M';
01535                         }
01536                 
01537                         int curcnt = cnt;
01538                         int posAT;
01539                         if( (posAT=_divpt.getIndex( '@' )) < 0 )        cnt = addNNP( num, cnt, index, infoch );
01540                         else
01541                         {
01542                                 int tmpcnt = cnt;
01543                                 char chHi = *( _divpt.getBuffer()+posAT );
01544                                 *( _divpt.getBuffer()+posAT ) = 0;
01545                                 cnt = addNNP( num, cnt, index, infoch );
01546                                 *( _divpt.getBuffer()+posAT ) = chHi;
01547                                 _addedcnt = cnt - curcnt;
01548                                 generateCandidates( num, index+1, cnt+1 );
01549                                 _nnpflag = 0;
01550                                 if( _total >= MAX_CANDIDATE )   return _total;
01551                                 num = _total++;
01552                                 for(int i=0; i < tmpcnt; i++ )
01553                                 {
01554                                         tupleN_[num].cnoun[i] = tupleN_[num-1].cnoun[i];
01555                                         tupleN_[num].index[i] = tupleN_[num-1].index[i];
01556                                 }
01557                                 _divpt = _divpt.getBuffer()+posAT+1;
01558                                 cnt = addNNP( num, tmpcnt, index, infoch );
01559                         }
01560 
01561                         _addedcnt = cnt - curcnt;
01562                 }
01563                 
01564                 generateCandidates( num, index+1, cnt+1 );
01565                 if( _nnpflag == 1)      cnt -= _addedcnt;
01566                 if( (cnt > 0) && (tupleN_[curnum].cnoun[cnt].pattern == 0) ) cnt--;
01567                 generateCandidates( curnum, index+1, cnt+1 );
01568         }
01569         else
01570         {
01571                 generateCandidates( num, index+1, cnt );
01572         }
01573 
01574         return _total;
01575 }
01576 
01577 int DecomposeNNP::getFreqofPattern( int dcpattern )
01578 {
01579         int lower = 0, upper = MAX_dcp-1, mid;
01580         
01581         while( lower <= upper )
01582         {
01583                 mid = (lower + upper) / 2;
01584         
01585                 if( dcpattern == dcp[mid].pattern )             return dcp[mid].weight;
01586                 else if( dcpattern > dcp[mid].pattern ) lower = mid + 1;
01587                 else                                                                    upper = mid - 1;
01588         }
01589 
01590         return 0;
01591 }
01592 
01593 double DecomposeNNP::scoringPattern( struct compoundNoun* dcpattern )
01594 {
01595     int i;
01596 
01597         int dcpt = 0, cnt = 0, weightofpattern = 0;
01598         
01599         DivideInfo dInfo;
01600         PosInfo pInfo;
01601         
01602         for( i=MAX_NOUN-1; i >= 0; i-- )
01603         {
01604                 if( dcpattern[i].pattern > 0 )
01605                 {
01606                         dcpt += dcpattern[i].pattern*(int)(pow(10.0, cnt));
01607                         cnt++;
01608                 }
01609         }
01610 
01611         if( cnt == 0 )  return 0.0;
01612 
01613         weightofpattern = getFreqofPattern( dcpt );
01614         int point = 0, valueofdiv = 0, valueofpos = 0;
01615 
01616         for( i=0; i < cnt-1; i++ )
01617         {
01618                 point += dcpattern[i].pattern*2;
01619                 _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromDivTrie( _nnp.getSubString(point-2, point+2).getBuffer(), dInfo, 4 );
01620                 valueofdiv += dInfo.freq;
01621         }
01622 
01623         if( (valueofdiv > 0) && (cnt > 1) )     valueofdiv /= cnt-1;
01624         
01625         point = dcpattern[0].pattern*2;
01626 
01627         if( dcpattern[0].pattern > 1 )
01628         {
01629                 _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromPosTrie( _nnp.getSubString(0, point).getBuffer(), pInfo, point );
01630                 valueofpos = pInfo.freq_first;
01631         }
01632 
01633         int nextpoint = point;
01634 
01635         for( i=1; i < cnt-1; i++ )
01636         {
01637                 point = nextpoint;
01638                 nextpoint = (dcpattern[i].pattern*2)+point;
01639         
01640                 if( dcpattern[i].pattern > 1 )
01641                 {
01642                         _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromPosTrie( _nnp.getSubString(point, nextpoint).getBuffer(), pInfo, nextpoint-point );
01643                         valueofpos += pInfo.freq_middle;
01644                 }
01645         }
01646 
01647         point = nextpoint;
01648         nextpoint = (dcpattern[cnt-1].pattern*2)+point;
01649 
01650         if( dcpattern[cnt-1].pattern > 1 )
01651         {
01652                 _pdic->searchNgetInfoFromPosTrie( _nnp.getSubString(point, nextpoint).getBuffer(), pInfo, nextpoint-point );
01653                 valueofpos += pInfo.freq_last;
01654         }
01655         
01656         valueofpos /= cnt;
01657         
01658         return ((weightofpattern*100)+(valueofdiv/1000.0)+(valueofpos/500.0))/1000.0;
01659 }
